sentence.Network_en: I hastily packed the hamper and lugged it to the car.
sentence.Network_cn: 我匆忙装好食品篮，吃力地把它拎上车子。

sentence.Network_en: Chairs were hastily placed in rows for the parents.
sentence.Network_cn: 椅子匆忙摆成了几排，等着家长们到来。

sentence.Network_en: She wrote it hastily and messily on a scrap of paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在一张纸片上匆忙而潦草地写了下来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... hasten 促进 hastily 匆忙地 hasty 急忙的.
The Tao views this region of domain as something hastily cast and for another purpose ., 道回顾了这个领域 , 因为有东西匆忙铸造而为了另一个目的.
百度词典搜索_草 ... 草本植物[ herb] 草草[ hastily;carelessly;roughly] 草测[ preliminary survey].
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(二) - 豆丁网 ... shield n. 盾，盾牌 hastily ad. 匆忙地；草率地；性急地 haste n. 匆忙，急忙.

list.abs: Parliament was hastily recalled from recess ., 休会的议员被匆匆召回议事.
he shifted hastily to a new subject ., 他匆忙转换一个新的话题.
Gorbatenko hastily found spade and waved it at the German .他连忙找来一把铲子，向那德国人挥舞。
Caderousse hastily shut the door and returned to his guest , while La Carconte lighted a candle smouldering ashes that glimmered on the hearth .卡德鲁斯急忙关上门，又回到了他的客人那里，而卡康脱女人则在壁炉里快要熄灭的炭火上点起了一支蜡烛。

entry.def: A hasty movement, action, or statement is sudden, and often done in reaction to something that has just happened.

example.ex: One company is giving its employees airplane tickets in the event they need to make a hasty escape.
example.tran: 一家公司正在给自己的员工发机票，万一需要就紧急撤离。

entry.tran: 仓促而就的;匆忙结束的
entry.def: A hasty event or action is one that is completed more quickly than normal.

example.ex: After the hasty meal, the men had moved forward to take up their positions.
example.tran: 匆匆忙忙吃过饭后，大家走出来，各就各位。

entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as hasty, you mean that they are acting too quickly, without thinking carefully, for example because they are angry.

example.ex: So let's not be hasty. After all, he can't run away...
example.tran: 所以我们不要鲁莽行事。毕竟他是跑不掉的。

example.ex: A number of the United States' allies had urged him not to take a hasty decision.
example.tran: 美国的一些盟友已力劝他不要急于作决定。

means.word_mean: 1. in a hurried or hasty manner;

sentences.sentence: "the way they buried him so hurriedly was disgraceful"
"sold in haste and at a sacrifice"

auth_sentence.content: Buyers are acting hastily but for a good reason.
auth_sentence.res_content: Buyers are acting hastily but for a good reason.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Buyers are acting hastily but for a good reason.

auth_sentence.content: A spare-room...in which an overnight bag has been unpacked hastily.
auth_sentence.res_content: A spare-room...in which an overnight bag has been unpacked hastily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A spare-room...in which an overnight bag has been unpacked hastily.

auth_sentence.content: I hastily did my utmost to reassure him.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hastily did my utmost to reassure him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hastily did my utmost to reassure him.

sentences.en: a hastily assembled force of warriors
sentences.cn: 紧急召集起来的一队勇士

sentences.en: Christina blushed and hastily lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 克里斯蒂娜脸一红，匆忙垂下了眼睛。

sentences.en: He hastily stuffed a few clothes into a bag.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆地把几件衣服塞进一个包。

sentences.en: He retreated hastily back to his car.
sentences.cn: 他匆忙退回自己的车里。

sentences.en: I query very much whether it is wise to act so hastily.
sentences.cn: 我真怀疑如此操之过急地行动是否明智。
